devdoc.author: Kenneth Hu
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

params.desc: the value of ipfs hash of bounty
params.title: the title of bounty

devdoc.title: Bounty management

addBounty(string,string,string,uint256).notice: Add a bounty to list of all bounties

applyToBounty(uint256).notice: Adds a non owner account as an applicant

cancelBounty(uint256).notice: allows the owner to cancel the bounty

completeBounty(uint256).notice: allows the owner to complete the bounty and make payment

completeWork(uint256).notice: allows the worker to complete the bounty

getApplicants(uint256).notice: get the list of applicantst by the index of bounty

getArbitrator(uint256).notice: get arbitrator of a bounty by the index of bounty

getOwner(uint256).notice: get owner of a bounty by the index of bounty

getWorker(uint256).notice: get worker of a bounty by the index of bounty

isComplete(uint256).notice: Returns if the bounty is completed

isWorkComplete(uint256).notice: Returns if the worker has marked the bounty as complete

setArbitrator(uint256,address).notice: allows the owner to assign an arbitrator

setWorker(uint256,address).notice: allows the owner to assign a worker

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to manage bounty.
